data.lyric:
[ti:Gangstas (Explicit)]
[ar:Pop Smoke]
[al:Shoot For The Stars Aim For The Moon (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Gangstas (Explicit) - Pop Smoke
[00:00.73]Lyrics by：Bashar Jackson
[00:01.47]Composed by：Alex Petit/Ellis Newton/Bashar Jackson
[00:02.20]Them n***as gotta hear what the f**k I'm talking 'bout
[00:04.49]Woo woo
[00:05.05]I be in New York
[00:06.10]Feel me Lil' Z
[00:06.98]I be in New York with the gangsters
[00:08.45]On your set with some real s**t n***a
[00:10.38]Gangsters
[00:10.85]Swerve
[00:11.96]I don't want none of that extra loud s**t
[00:14.75]This ain't none of that rainbow hair s**t
[00:16.64]Know what I'm sayin'
[00:17.99]I be in New York with the gangsters
[00:19.55]This the real streets s**t yeah n***a
[00:20.90]I be in New York with the gangsters
[00:22.47]F**king voice of the streets man
[00:23.75]It's like Jesus walkin'
[00:26.22]Woozing automatics
[00:27.40]More like Christopher Walking man
[00:28.77]I be with the straights and the apes
[00:30.75]Y'all know what's up
[00:31.46]Talking stone to stone
[00:34.39]Bringing bags we don't wanna hear nothing 'bout it
[00:39.31]Free all my n***as free all the streets
[00:41.79]I be in New York with the gangsters
[00:44.36]Know a n***a that'll shoot you for a tandem
[00:46.50]Grrt
[00:46.99]If my opps is chilling in the foreign
[00:49.16]Bah
[00:49.56]Then my n***as shooting up the Phantom
[00:51.92]Bah bah bah
[00:53.15]I be in New York with the gangsters
[00:54.82]Woo
[00:55.12]Know a n***a that'll shoot you for a tandem
[00:57.15]Bah
[00:57.70]If my opps is chilling in the foreign
[00:59.78]You lacking a*s n***as
[01:00.69]Then my n***as shooting up the Phantom
[01:02.74]Grrt
[01:03.98]44 got a kickback
[01:05.25]Bah
[01:05.64]Click-clack get back
[01:06.65]Bah
[01:07.01]Shots at your rib pack
[01:07.87]Grrrt
[01:08.14]Or you can get chin checked
[01:09.00]Woo
[01:09.14]Them trolling n***as acting up
[01:10.24]Acting up
[01:10.72]So n***as packed him up
[01:11.61]Pack him up
[01:12.06]Brazy was acting tough
[01:13.12]'Til n***as slapped him up
[01:14.45]P***y
[01:14.65]Pop Smoke on top
[01:15.84]Haha
[01:16.28]N***as mad as f**k
[01:17.28]Mad
[01:17.56]Six by six big Benz on my wrist
[01:19.79]If you don't got your nails done you are not it
[01:22.55]Woo
[01:22.89]Automatically on the blocked list
[01:24.47]Blocked b***h
[01:25.12]N***as talking 'bout they guns
[01:26.61]Guns
[01:26.92]But never shot s**t
[01:27.87]Cap
[01:27.93]Might as well put a cap on it all over with a chopstick
[01:30.38]P***y
[01:30.72]Run up and I'm branding them take a n***a shoppin'
[01:33.16]B***h
[01:33.31]Reach and I'm branching it 'cause I don't know who watchin'
[01:35.77]I'm on point
[01:36.30]It's a Ginger Ale and Henny day eased up on the crème brûlée
[01:38.65]Hahaha
[01:38.70]38's on the block
[01:39.89]Block
[01:39.97]A n***a won't hesitate
[01:41.12]Bah
[01:41.38]Had to move these b***hes up
[01:42.64]Move up
[01:43.06]'Cause they was in the way
[01:44.05]I wouldn't want them to get shot by an enemy
[01:46.13]I be in New York with the gangsters
[01:47.62]And what's up
[01:48.26]Know a n***a that'll shoot you for a tandem
[01:50.32]Tandem grrt
[01:50.97]If my opps is chilling in the foreign
[01:53.32]Bah
[01:53.62]Then my n***as shooting up the Phantom
[01:55.96]Bah bah bah
[01:57.13]I be in New York with the gangsters
[01:58.52]Woo
[01:58.86]Know a n***a that'll shoot you for a tandem
[02:01.11]Bah
[02:01.45]If my opps is chilling in the foreign
[02:03.79]You lacking a*s n***as
[02:04.96]Then my n***as shooting up the Phantom
[02:06.73]Grrt
data.trans:
[ti:Gangstas (Explicit)]
[ar:Pop Smoke]
[al:Shoot For The Stars Aim For The Moon (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.73]//
[00:01.46]//
[00:02.20]这些家伙马上就会见识到我的厉害之处
[00:04.49]//
[00:05.05]我在纽约
[00:06.10]我气场强大
[00:06.98]我在纽约 和这些暴徒在一起
[00:08.45]哥们 动点真格的
[00:10.38]暴徒
[00:10.85]//
[00:11.96]我不歇斯底里的玩说唱
[00:14.75]这可不是顶着五彩缤纷头发的家伙写的那种歌
[00:16.64]你明白我的意思了吧
[00:17.99]我在纽约 和这些暴徒在一起
[00:19.55]真正在道上混的哥们
[00:20.90]我在纽约 和这些暴徒在一起
[00:22.47]街头的呼声震耳欲聋
[00:23.75]犹如耶稣漫步
[00:26.22]让兄弟开枪扫射
[00:27.40]更像是Christopher在街头横行霸道
[00:28.77]我无所畏惧 长驱直入
[00:30.75]你心知肚明
[00:31.46]冥顽不灵
[00:34.39]把钱带来 我们不想听废话
[00:39.31]放了我的兄弟 解除街头禁令
[00:41.79]我在纽约 和这些暴徒在一起
[00:44.36]要知道我可不是好惹的
[00:46.50]//
[00:46.99]如果我的对手开着进口车炫耀
[00:49.16]//
[00:49.56]我的兄弟会从幻影车里开枪
[00:51.92]//
[00:53.15]我在纽约 和这些暴徒在一起
[00:54.82]//
[00:55.12]要知道我可不是好惹的
[00:57.15]//
[00:57.70]如果我的对手开着进口车炫耀
[00:59.78]你形单影只
[01:00.69]我的兄弟会从幻影车里开枪
[01:02.74]//
[01:03.98]手握0.44口径的枪 致命反击
[01:05.25]//
[01:05.64]扣动扳机 回击
[01:06.65]//
[01:07.01]打中你的肋骨
[01:07.87]//
[01:08.14]或是打中你的下巴
[01:09.00]//
[01:09.14]这些哥们装腔作势
[01:10.24]装腔作势
[01:10.72]狠狠教训他一顿
[01:11.61]教训一顿
[01:12.06]他外强中干
[01:13.12]直到他被打得落花流水
[01:14.45]怂货
[01:14.65]Pop Smoke屹立巅峰
[01:15.84]//
[01:16.28]大家都气急败坏
[01:17.28]生气
[01:17.56]我戴的手表就价值一辆奔驰的钱
[01:19.79]如果你不知收敛 你一无四处
[01:22.55]//
[01:22.89]我自动把你加入黑名单
[01:24.47]加入黑名单
[01:25.12]哥们整天把枪挂在嘴边
[01:26.61]枪
[01:26.92]可是从来不敢扣动扳机
[01:27.87]吹牛
[01:27.93]我可能会出手帮助 易如反掌
[01:30.38]怂货
[01:30.72]我赚到盆满钵满 我带兄弟去购物
[01:33.16]碧池
[01:33.31]我安排眼线 因为我不知道谁对我虎视眈眈
[01:35.77]我炙手可热
[01:36.30]今天畅饮姜汁汽水和轩尼诗红酒 配上焦糖布丁 我心满意足
[01:38.65]//
[01:38.70]在街区现身
[01:39.89]街区
[01:39.97]我不会犹豫不决
[01:41.12]//
[01:41.38]让这些家伙滚到一边去
[01:42.64]扫清障碍
[01:43.06]因为他们挡我路了
[01:44.05]我不想他们被敌人杀害
[01:46.13]我在纽约 和这些暴徒在一起
[01:47.62]怎么回事
[01:48.26]要知道我可不是好惹的
[01:50.32]//
[01:50.97]如果我的对手开着进口车炫耀
[01:53.32]//
[01:53.62]我的兄弟会从幻影车里开枪
[01:55.96]//
[01:57.13]我在纽约 和这些暴徒在一起
[01:58.52]//
[01:58.86]要知道我可不是好惹的
[02:01.11]//
[02:01.45]如果我的对手开着进口车炫耀
[02:03.79]你形单影只
[02:04.96]我的兄弟会从幻影车里开枪
[02:06.73]//
